BenchGen

Blog Publications News  Star on GitHub



The BenchGen project aims to synthesize programs that are sufficiently expressive to stress-test computing systems, such as operating systems, compiler optimizations, memory allocation libraries and even computer architectures.



View the Project on GitHub benchGen/benchGen.github.io


V. F. da Silva, H. Leite, and F. M. Q. Pereira. Multi-Language Benchmark Generation via L-Systems. Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (UFMG), Brazil, 2025.
